postman.setGlobalVariable("getId", () => {var baseUrl = pm.environment.get('baseURL');pm.sendRequest({    url: baseUrl + '/booking/',    method: 'GET'}, function (err, res) {    console.log(res);    pm.environment.set("id", res.json()[0].bookingid);});
